QuestData.Title: Securing the Province
QuestData.Description: With our grip on the province loosening, saurok from the wilds have already moved in to the cave just north of town.$B$BMost of our hunters are face-down in their own tears, so the saurok just walk in here like they own the place and grab whatever they want!$B$BI want to send a message that Zhu's Watch is not to be crossed.$B$BWill you be my messenger?
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 10 Wildscale Saurok or Wildscale Herbalists in Zhu Province.
QuestData.CompletionText: We cannot let the saurok walk all over us anymore.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $n. That should teach those savages to know their boundaries.
